price: (Demikianlah keadaan orang-orang kafir itu) hingga apabila datang kematian kepada seseorang dari mereka, dia berkata, "Ya Tuhan-ku kembalikanlah aku (ke dunia) 1022,
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ
footnotes: 1022.  Maksudnya, orang-orang kafir pada waktu menghadapi sakratul maut meminta supaya diperpanjang umur mereka agar mereka dapat beriman.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadahumu al-mawtu qāla rabbi ir'jiʿūni
